title: WTTS/WTT- AWESOME Snodgrass Yellow/brown Printer's scrap
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: WTTS/WTT- AWESOME Snodgrass Yellow/brown Printer's scrap
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone

looking to sell or trade or combo trade/cash for this AWESOME  ,  RARE, raw, "yellow/brown" sweet caporal 350-460 fact #30 "no print" Snodgrass missing all of the color passes except brown/yellow/red/black...

there are approximately 34 "known " players available in this type of "no print back"(Snodgrass is not available with a sweet cap 350/460 fact #30)....a total of approx. 74 known examples( prob 2 sheets survived and were hand cut after disposal)

although the back is in poor condition, it is one of the documented yellow / browns as they have been nick named......Chris B and I have been researching these for some years now, along with Ted, Jim R, Tim C , Jamie, Chuck, Adam, Jantz, and many other 206 experts ........


I have theorized these yellow browns were concurrently printed with the super rare BROADLEAF 460'S :eek:.....


[url]http://www.t206resource.com/Broad%20Leaf%20460%20Checklist.html[/url]



there ARE ONLY 2 known Snodgrass examples (Sean owns the other one), out of the available 34 players/74 known total population

Chris B has pieced a cool collage of all the known 350/460 Sweet Caporal yellow browns

notice the Snodgrass(first one)


these are RARE and have traded/sold regularly for $1000.00 and up consistently for many years now ......

looking for $1100.00 

OR 

1)  A LENOX BACK

OR

2)  2 BROADLEAF BACKS

OR 

3) Red Cobb, Cobb bat on or off OR A BEATER GREEN

OR

4) Decent RED HINDU

OR

5) 2 CAROLINA BACKS

OR

6) A BEATER UZIT

OR


You get the jist of it!;)

I will consider cash/trade/combo


email preferred 

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]

to all offers/ or combo trade offers

:)

This is a GREAT opportunity to pick up a legit color variation scrap !

final drop of $950.00:eek:

can not go lower, that's what I have into it:D

$900.00   :eek:

this is a steal for a legit authentic yellow brown printers scrap !

DO NOT miss out on this card! HAS ALMOST NO COLOR!  only yellow/brwn/red made it to these....card some back damage and off condition, but this is the real deal

SC 460 fact 30  are the most recognized scrap.....true "COLOR VARIATION"

only 2 Snodgrass known to exist.......75 or so total population of this type of scrap...

THESE WERE PRINTED CONCURRENTLY WITH BL 460!

(this is a theory of mine and a few other experts, but I haven't proven it yet.....)


email me cash or trade


[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]
